item.description:
I would be interested in having a house party at my place for those not able to attend PAX either out of lack of interest or because passes are sold out.

Who would be interested? My house is in Medford, near Davis Square. I can easily have a party for 25-30 people.

 

Directions:

 

Red line towards Alewife, get off at Davis Square.  Walk up College Ave to Powderhouse Square, take first right on Broadway and second left on Bristol Road (10-15 minute walk)

 

Orange line towards Oak Grove, get off at Sullivan Square.  Pick up the 89 towards Davis or Clarendon.  Get off at Ball Square, walk towards Powderhouse (west) and take first right onto Bristol Road (2 minute walk).
item.name: Non-PAX house party
